problemAwareness.headingText: The Hidden Cost of Poor Facebook Ads Tracking
problemAwareness.paragraphText: Most businesses are losing up to 40% of their conversion data due to iOS changes and poor tracking setup. Without accurate data, you're essentially throwing money into a black hole.
points: Lost Revenue: Inaccurate data leads to poor ad optimization
Wasted Budget: You're paying for ads that might not work
Missed Opportunities: Unable to scale winning campaigns confidently
problemAwareness.secondaryParagraphText: Get back 40% of your conversion data that was being lost due to iOS changes and poor tracking setup. With accurate data, you're essentially making more money.
secondaryListItems: Know exactly which ads drive real results
Reduce cost per acquisition by up to 30%
